name: ICEBOX: Speedgunner (Steam Key)
description:
STEAM KEY PURCHASE:

  • Please note that you're purchasing a STEAM KEY and demo. The key will unlock the FULL GAME (for Win/Mac/Linux) using a registered Steam Account. More info can be found here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/577150/ICEBOX_Speedgunner

ICEBOX: Speedgunner is a competitive Run-and-Gun 3D Platforming FPS.

THE CLOCK IS TICKING…

Carve an ice-cool path through the Icebox, cutting corners, dodging obstacles and eliminating guards, as you run-and-gun your way through it's digital labyrinth to become the Ultimate Speedgunner.

Inspired by the "Brain in a Vat" thought-experiment, this game leverages it's run-&-gun gameplay to explore the concept of escaping your own virtual prison.

Can you "Escape the Icebox" before time runs out? 

NOTES:

  • Any free demos are based upon older versions of the game. The demo uses the Gamejolt ecosystem to manage leaderboards. You don't require a Gamejolt account to play.
